text:
JEdit provides very good Ant support.

Install it and try the Ant Farm plugin.

Warning: Once installed you may want to switch editors.

http://www.jedit.org

From the help file:

The AntFarm plugin provides quick access to Ant build files from within jEdit. 
It has five main features:
View the structure of an Ant build file.
Dynamically parse Ant build files and display errors.
Run Ant targets from within jEdit.
Integration with the Console plugin.
Access to the Ant build file's assets.

Hey, we know about jedit. who do you think supplied the <ant> mode to them?
